question_text: What is the patient's full name?
What is the patient's date of birth?
What is the patient's gender?
What is the policy number or insurance ID?
What is the date range covered by this APS (earliest to latest encounter date)?
List all visit dates with the reason for each visit.
What is the most recent encounter date and reason for visit?
What is the total number of encounters documented in the APS?
List all blood pressure readings with their dates.
What is the most recent BMI value and its date?
What are the height and weight measurements with their dates?
Is there a trend in blood pressure readings (improving, worsening, stable)?
List all laboratory results with values, reference ranges, and whether each is normal or abnormal.
Are there any critical or significantly abnormal lab values? If so, list them.
What is the most recent HbA1c value and date?
What are the most recent lipid panel results (total cholesterol, LDL, HDL, triglycerides) and date?
List all medications with dosage, frequency, and prescribing physician.
For each medication, is the patient currently taking it?
Are any controlled substances prescribed (opioids, benzodiazepines, stimulants)? If so, list them with details.
List all diagnosed conditions with dates of onset.
For each diagnosed condition, is it chronic or acute? What is the current status?
Have there been any specialist referrals? If so, list each specialist type, reason, and date.
List all surgical and non-surgical procedures with dates and outcomes.
Were there any complications from procedures? If so, describe each.
Provide a complete summary of the patient's past medical and surgical history.
Is there any additional relevant history (family history, social history, review of systems)?
Has the patient received treatment for alcohol use or abuse within the past 2 years?
Does the patient currently use tobacco or have a history of tobacco use?
Has the patient used illicit drugs or been treated for drug abuse within the past 3 years?
Has the patient been diagnosed with dementia or cognitive impairment?
Has the patient had a CVA (stroke) or TIA within the past 1 year?
Has the patient had a myocardial infarction (heart attack) within the past 3 months?
Is the patient currently on or has been recommended for renal dialysis?
Has the patient been diagnosed with cancer (any type)? If so, provide type, stage, and treatment status.
Has the patient had a cardiac valve replacement or repair?
Has the patient been diagnosed with AIDS or HIV?
Has the patient been determined to have a disability due to a mental health disorder?
Has the patient attempted suicide within the past 1 year?
Has the patient had any psychiatric hospitalizations? If so, list dates and reasons.
Has the patient been diagnosed with cirrhosis of the liver?
Has the patient had gastric bypass or bariatric surgery within the past 6 months?
What morbidity risk factors are present based on the medical records (e.g., uncontrolled conditions, multiple comorbidities, non-compliance)?
Based on current medical findings, what is the future morbidity risk assessment?
What mortality risk factors are present based on the medical records?
Are there any life-threatening conditions or terminal diagnoses documented?
Has the patient resided in or traveled to a foreign country? If so, provide details.
Are there any travel-related health concerns documented (tropical diseases, endemic exposures)?
